text: Cyril Francis Walter Allcott was born 7 October, 1896 in Lower Moutere and died 19 November, 1973 in Auckland. He played six test matches for New Zealand from 1930 to 1932. He also played for Hawke's Bay and Auckland in the Plunket Shield. ==Other websites== * Category:1896 births Category:1973 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Cyril Allcott
